name: 姚長安
objective:
為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。

如果你想體驗創業前該具備的專業與過程，如果你想學習在未來不論是升學 (簡報設計、創業計畫書) 或就業 (Wix 網站、Line 官方帳號) 或探索自己 (行銷、財務)，任何一項能力都能讓你在未來年薪百萬甚至創業，因此這堂課絕對不是輕鬆可及的營養學分，但絕對是你人生經歷中的營養學分。

To encourage and help students use technology or business models, collaborate with school teachers or cross-school classmates, and jointly solve social or business problems through business methods, this course will be conducted in a sprint class format. We will invite teachers and industry professionals with entrepreneurial experience to help students progress weekly through workshops and entrepreneurship competition drills. The goal is to help students implement their entrepreneurial ideas, apply them to society, and bring about change.

If you want to experience the professional skills and processes required before starting a business, or if you want to learn skills that will be valuable whether you pursue further education (presentation design, business plan writing), employment (Wix website, Line official account), or self-exploration (marketing, finance), any of these abilities can help you earn a million-dollar annual salary in the future or start your own business. Therefore, this course is not an easy elective but a valuable life experience.
